header.title: RaidAttendance - Addon
header.description: MOD for the phpBB that enables administrators to manage a list of raiders associated with forum-users and allow these to sign off/on to raids on a per-day basis.
header.author-notes: The MOD integrates to the http://eu.wowarmory.com service for synchronization of raiders and have experimental integration with the http://www.worldoflogs.com for checking raid-attendancy.

changelog.change: Support for multiple raid-setups + various minor bug-fixes
Bugfixes to save and delete functionality + experimental integration with World of Logs
Update to install.xml to be MODX compliant.
Minor authentication bugfix and new icons from Yorrick.

First Official Release. Supports: ADMIN: * UMIL + AutoMOD for installing the MOD. * Configuration of rank-names, rank-status, raider-level etc. * Automatical sync with armory. * Manually adding raider * Deleting raiders USERS: * Signing off from raids in the future. * Permanently signing off from specific raiding days. MODERATORS: * Signing off on behalf of raiders. * Recording raiders attendance on raids already completed.

action-group.diy-instructions: Go to the page /install and complete the auto-installation (or upgrade) instructions. Once completed configure the MOD under FORUMS > RAIDATTENDANCE > CONFIGURATION
